description: Amakawa Seigen is the ninth head of the Amakawa family. He likes sushi. He hates children, anmitsu and television. He is the teacher of http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] and http://anidb.net/ch78913 [Yuuto]. He looks like a juvenile boy but he is http://anidb.net/ch79726 [Mayura`s] father. Despite his sharp tongue and distant attitude, he does in fact care strongly for other people.
name: Amawaka Seigen
